block.p: Germaine Marie Febles and Charles Arthur Andruss were married yesterday afternoon by the Rev. Stephen DeLuca at St. Agnes Roman Catholic Church in Greenwich, Conn.

The bride, 25, is an account executive for Rubenstein Associates, a public relations agency in Manhattan. She graduated from Fordham University with a B.A. in political science. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John Febles of Greenwich.
Germaine Marie Febles and Charles Arthur Andruss were married yesterday afternoon by the Rev. Stephen DeLuca at St. Agnes Roman Catholic Church in Greenwich, Conn.

The bride, 25, is an account executive for Rubenstein Associates, a public relations agency in Manhattan. She graduated from Fordham University with a B.A. in political science. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John Febles of Greenwich.

The bridegroom, 27, is the deputy director of advance planning of appearances and events for Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani. He received a B.A. in government from Hamilton College. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas G. Andruss of Scarsdale, N.Y.
The couple met at City Hall in 1997, when the bridegroom was a mayoral liaison and the bride worked as an assistant to Cristyne F. Lategano, who was the communications director for Mayor Giuliani.
